# Jo Zapf – Web Development & Application Development | Berlin

> Aspiring IT specialist for application development (Fachinformatiker für Anwendungsentwicklung, FIAE/IHK) with 25+ years of cross-media, IT infrastructure and web/CMS experience. Based in Berlin. Currently seeking a mandatory internship (Pflichtpraktikum) in application development starting June 2026.

## Internship (Pflichtpraktikum)
- [Pflichtpraktikum Anwendungsentwicklung Berlin (DE)](https://jozapf.de/pflichtpraktikum-anwendungsentwicklung-berlin/): Mandatory internship page with fact sheet, profile, skills and contact — German version
- [Mandatory Internship Application Development Berlin (EN)](https://jozapf.de/en/pflichtpraktikum-anwendungsentwicklung-berlin/): Mandatory internship page with fact sheet, profile, skills and contact — English version

## Main
- [Startseite (DE)](https://jozapf.de/): Portfolio, experience timeline, skills and services — German version
